attributes.action: remove "lee rigby deserved it" facebook group and have charges of insighting racial hatred brought against the posts on it
attributes.additional_details: This is offensive to Lee Rigby's family. The posts on it are offensive to the British people and their armed forces.

rejection.details: The Government cannot interfere with offensive content on the internet if it is not actually illegal.  And there are laws already about inciting racial hatred.   However, this is somthing the Government is monitoring closely.
